GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics
serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an array of one article

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments all with the same article_id

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: adds an a new comment to the comments table, returning that comment

exampleResponse.body: this is a new well thought out comment
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: increments the votes for a sepcific article, returning that article

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes a comment which matches the comment_id provided
